articles.author: Sean Ingle
articles.title: Fred Kerley runs down astonishing gold as US men sweep 100m at Worlds - The Guardian
articles.description: Kerley took gold in 9.86 beating Marvin Bracy and Trayvon Bromell in 9.88, the first US sweep of the men’s 100m at world championships since 1991.
